comments.content:
The "about" dialog should probably contain the following information:

-License of the data used (CC-BY-SA 2.0)
-License of the software
-version number (and maybe date)
-URL of osmdroid homepage (i.e. http://code.google.com/p/osmdroid)

Any concrete hint for the text? Something like:

Version 2.0

This software is released under
the terms of LGPLv3.

Visit
code.google.com/p/osmdroid

This software uses map data provided by
OpenStreetMap.org (CC-BY-SA 2.0)

I like that suggestion. (Please disreagard my old comment, it didn't refer to the
latest version)
Also Cloudmade has some requirements, as do the other tile providers, I imagine.

A quick implementation can be obtained by using OI About 

http://www.openintents.org/en/node/191
